name: TripsOnAir
body:
## Welcome to TripsOnAir Project

### If you are wondering how you landed on the github page instead of the website, read below:
The website is currently down due to lack of funding for the AWS Server Hosting. We are working on alternate means to bring back the website. Thank you for your support.

## Project Organisation
Please click on the View on Github button above to get more details about the project in the README

### Crawlers
Crawlers for different travel websites

### TripPlannerApp
Node (KrakenJS) + AngularJS website for planning travel

### Authors and Contributors
Rahul Kapoor (@r-kapoor) and Rajat Gupta(@rajat246)

### Website
Check out our [website](https://www.tripsonair.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
